entry.title: Let's talk House of the Dragon Ep 10 (Season review)

media:group.media:title: Let's talk House of the Dragon Ep 10 (Season review)
media:group.media:description:
Let us know your hottest takes in the comments beforehand and join the conversation about HBO's House of the Dragon episode 10!
Join the Discord community: https://discord.gg/PgzQU8MY5X

media:group.media:title: Why Endings Matter
media:group.media:description:
Working towards an ending is and underrated but crucial part of any story. Here we go into depth about why endings matter.
This project has been a long time coming, my colleagues and I have put a lot of love and effort into it, so I hope you'll enjoy it!
00:00 Intro 00:30 Thesis 01:47 Ruining a good story 03:35 Suffering from success 05:27 Letting stories end 06:45 Size doesn't matter 08:08 New stories need more new 08:22 How to sequel 09:34 How to spin-off 11:08 A good ending = immortality 12:01 Outro
Support my work: Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/culturevulturem Buymeacoffee: https://buymeacoffee.com/CultureVulture
Thanks a bunch to Mokarokas and Jeremy for your generous support!
Discord community: https://discord.gg/PgzQU8MY5X

00:00:00 Intro 00:00:30 Rhea Royce meets relatives 00:00:52 Maybe it's Maybelline 00:01:27 The King pukes and the Hand wipes 00:01:42 Emily Carey bows out 00:02:08 The gang arrives at Driftmark 00:02:38 Larys the Varys 00:03:31 The King's proposal 00:04:34 Laenor gay 00:05:03 Laenor gay 00:05:23 Joffrey gay 00:05:52 Criston bet's it all on black 00:07:43 Crispy confessions 00:08:02 GOOD DIALOGUE 00:08:35 Dragon quota filled 00:08:42 People teleporting in 00:09:28 Velaryons arrive 00:09:50 Alicent arrives 00:10:34 Mushroom! 00:11:13 Gerold's accusation 00:11:57 Daemon flirts with a child 00:12:16 Confronting Criston 00:13:03 Ballroom blitz 00:13:55 Murderer walks away 00:14:28 Wedding starts 00:14:52 Criston decides to end it 00:15:15 Outro

entry.title: House of the Dragon Ep 4 in a Nutshell

media:group.media:title: House of the Dragon Ep 4 in a Nutshell
media:group.media:description:
Reupload (after getting blocked for a new sensible reason every time!) of my weekly review of HBO's House of the Dragon.
What did you think of the fourth episode?
Support my work: Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/culturevulturem Buymeacoffee: https://buymeacoffee.com/CultureVulture
Discord community: https://discord.gg/PgzQU8MY5X
00:00:00 Intro 00:00:47 Judging Some Boys 00:02:38 The Fire Creature attacks (nothing happens) 00:03:10 Daemon returns 00:03:50 New tapestries 00:06:12 Small council meeting 00:06:52 Helaena 00:07:06 Rhaenyra sneaks out 00:08:05 Nothing happens 00:08:17 Mummers farce 00:09:31 Nothing happens 00:09:40 Nothing happens 00:10:11 Pleasure house 00:11:00 Rhaenyra returns to Red Keep 00:12:01 Mysaria still not a character 00:12:28 Otto's report 00:13:32 Alicent confronts Rhaenyra 00:14:07 Viserys busts Daemon's balls 00:14:36 Actual decent dialogue 00:14:59 Aegon the Retconqueror's dagger 00:16:06 RAP BATTLE - Vizzy T vs. R. Deelish 00:17:22 Viserys fires Otto 00:17:39 Plan T 00:17:46 Outro
Music credits: Retro Funk music by Mokka Investigations by Kevin Macleod Fairytale Orchestra by Mokka 70s Music by Dar Golan Funky Suspense by Bejamin Tissot Funkman by K. LOUK Chill Soul Rap Instrumental by Nkato Laid Back Guitars by Kevin Macleod Sneaky by Kevin Macleod Dramatic Action Background Music Sexy by Bensound Epic Cinematic Orchestral Music by Mokka Sneaky Snitch by Kevin Macleod Hidden Agenda by Kevin Macleod Trap 11 by White Mamba (featuring Vizzy T & Lil Queen) Scheaming Weasel by Kevin Macleod
